column5: Thanx Guys, 1st Treatment over & man was I tired afterwards, 1/2 the people at the lodge said they had to have a snooze this afternoon & I was 1 of them, Treatment & Doctors appointment tomorrow maybe I'll find out how many weeks I'll be here 5/6? Just had 3 games of euchere & pool, great group here, off to get my Tattoo in Cambridge Wednesday late afternoon I hope but I might have to sleep threw it lol Tight Lines Richard
You are an inspiration to all Richard. Keep up the positive attitude.This beast can be beaten
Good luck, keep us posted as U progress.

1st week is over & other than being extra tired things went fairly good & the week past fairly quickly, it was my Birthday on Thursday so I went out & bought 2 Ice Cream Cakes at Marble Slab for everybody at the Lodge for our night snack, Vanilla with gummy bears & sprinkles that I liked & Turtle flavour for the second one, they were a big hit, lol, 4 more weeks to go, maybe out fishing tomorrow for a bit in the afternoon Lake Huron Bruce A hydro plant Trout fishing, packing short for next weeks crazy weather, Tattoo was put on hold everybody was worried about infection oh well, only had 1 guy pissed off with me, I was watching the news & he was talking over the volume as I put it loader 3 times he finally looked over at me & said oh you have the remote, I replied ya I'm trying to listen to the damn news & he never talked to me the rest of the week & he never had a piece of my Ice Cream Cake lol Tight Lines SBK
Richard I'm glad to hear the first week went well and how can ya go wrong with icecream cake. Happy belated b day the weather this week looks great I hope you can get out and enjoy london
That's great news Richard    Stay positive and believe
You won the first Round Richard !!!!!!!!!!!!!! Excellent news  You can do it !!

Things are getting set, off to start Radiation on Mar 5th Monday to Friday for 5 or 6 Weeks, going to stay at the Thames Lodge in London, either meet some new friends or drive some people crazy lol, hoping to get hooked up with internet & will keep people informed as things progress, now to just get out fishing on Friday Tight Lines Richard
Good luck Richard we will be pulling for you for sure. Are you stating there for the full 6 weeks? Or heading home for weekends
Good luck.
Best of luck. Its gonna be an early spring, lots of fishing ahead.
All the best Richard....dont carry any microwave popcorn on your person unless you intend on sharing  Cheers Mate !
Home for the weekends, maybe some fishing lol, see what the wife says & how I feel Tight Lines SBK
Kick it in the   Richard!!
Good luck. Beat it down and get back out fishing!!!
Super good luck to you man!!!
Believe !!!!!
What Wayne said x2 Richard. Keep on keepin' on.
Good luck to you Richard and keep on believing... stay positive!!!
Good luck man!  Get all fixed up for the summer fishing season!
Good luck
All the best Richard.  Will be thinking about you.  Hope you can access internet while you are there so you can keep us posted.
x3 Good luck!!
Best of luck pal, we're all pulling for you !!
Chin up guy and the best of luck to you!!!
Good luck Richard.
Best of luck Richard
Mindset and body need to be on CRUSH...KILL...KO!  Be well.
the best of luck richard !!! you will be fishin in no time at all !!

From someone who's been there, keep up your strength by making sure you eat even if you lose your appetite and eat healthy. A positive outlook is also one of the most important things. Picture being out on your favorite lake trolling around or on your favorite river casting if you need a mental break. I used Lake Temagami as it was one of the lakes I grew up fishing. A fellow survivor I spoke to once told me that whenever they were receiving treatment, they pictured a little mouse inside their body, eating the bad cells, and it really helped them. Kick it's butt SBK!
X4
